data.lyric:
[ti:ENEMY (宿敌)]
[ar:Imagine Dragons,JID,英雄联盟]
[al:ENEMY (宿敌)]
[by:p_pttzhang]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Enemy - Imagine Dragons (梦龙)/JID
[00:02.24]Composed by：Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Daniel Platzman/Robin Fredriksson/Mattias Larsson/Justin Tranter/Destin Route p/k/a J.I.D
[00:04.49]Look out for yourself
[00:05.74]
[00:06.96]I wake up to the sounds of the silence that allows
[00:10.09]For my mind to run around with my ear up to the ground
[00:13.23]I'm searching to behold the stories that are told
[00:16.29]When my back is to the world that was smiling when I turned
[00:19.77]Tell you you're the greatest
[00:25.54]But once you turn they hate us
[00:31.68]
[00:32.87]Oh the misery
[00:35.03]Everybody wants to be my enemy
[00:38.33]
[00:38.98]Spare the sympathy
[00:41.33]Everybody wants to be
[00:43.52]My enemy
[00:48.12]Look out for yourself
[00:49.82]My enemy
[00:54.57]Look out for yourself
[00:55.81]But I'm ready
[00:56.95]Your words up on the wall as you're praying for my fall
[00:59.83]And the laughter in the halls and the names that I've been called
[01:03.06]I stack it in my mind and I'm waiting for the time
[01:06.11]When I show you what it's like to be words spit in a mic
[01:09.39]Tell you you're the greatest
[01:15.42]But once you turn they hate us
[01:21.56]
[01:22.93]Oh the misery
[01:25.01]Everybody wants to be my enemy
[01:28.03]
[01:28.87]Spare the sympathy
[01:31.34]Everybody wants to be
[01:33.46]My enemy
[01:38.02]Look out for yourself
[01:39.66]My enemy
[01:44.08]Look out for yourself
[01:45.88]Look Okay
[01:46.73]I'm hoping that somebody pray for me
[01:48.26]I'm praying that somebody hope for me
[01:49.81]I'm staying where nobody 'posed to be P-p-posted
[01:52.06]Being a wreck of emotions
[01:53.28]Ready to go whenever just let me know
[01:54.50]The road is long so put the pedal into the floor
[01:55.89]The enemy's on my trail my energy unavailable
[01:58.13]Imma tell 'em hasta luego
[01:59.27]They wanna plot on my trot to the top
[02:00.80]I've been outta shape thinkin' out the box
[02:01.85]I'm an astronaut I blasted off the planet rock
[02:03.76]To cause Catastrophe and it matters more because I had it not
[02:05.95]Had I thought about wreaking havoc on an opposition
[02:08.22]Kinda shockin' they wanted static with precision I'm automatic quarterback
[02:10.73]I ain't talkin' sacking pack it pack it up I don't panic batter batter up
[02:13.34]Who the baddest it don't matter cause we at ya throat
[02:15.07]Everybody wants to be my enemy
[02:17.75]
[02:18.81]Spare the sympathy
[02:21.16]Everybody wants to be
[02:23.25]My enemy
[02:25.00]Oh the misery
[02:26.66]
[02:27.27]Everybody wants to be my enemy
[02:29.83]
[02:31.19]Spare the sympathy
[02:32.93]
[02:33.51]Everybody wants to be
[02:35.64]My enemy
[02:36.86]Pray it away I swear I'll never be a saint no way
[02:41.20]
[02:41.88]My enemy
[02:43.08]Pray it away I swear I'll never be a saint
[02:46.55]Look out for yourself
data.trans:
[ti:ENEMY (宿敌)]
[ar:Imagine Dragons,JID,英雄联盟]
[al:ENEMY (宿敌)]
[by:p_pttzhang]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.24]//
[00:04.49]为自己活
[00:06.96]不知不觉发觉 沉默可以让我
[00:10.09]想法自由自在 洞悉变化袭来
[00:13.23]让我看看是谁 当着我面微笑
[00:16.29]背着我面捅刀 满嘴胡编乱造
[00:19.77]人前夸你最出色
[00:25.54]人后骂你最邪恶
[00:32.87]啊 难过
[00:35.03]每个人都想与我为敌
[00:38.97]别再假惺惺
[00:41.33]就是所有人都想
[00:43.52]与我为敌
[00:48.12]为自己活
[00:49.82]与我为敌
[00:54.57]为自己活
[00:55.81]来吧我不怕
[00:56.95]你写在墙上的字 祈祷我堕落的词
[00:59.83]对我的讥讽嘲笑 给我的恶名恶号
[01:03.06]全都扎在心里 早晚时机一到
[01:06.11]就像嘴巴出子弹 你们一个别想逃
[01:09.39]人前夸你最出色
[01:15.42]人后骂你最邪恶
[01:22.93]啊 悲惨
[01:25.01]每个人都想与我为敌
[01:28.87]收起你的假惺惺
[01:31.34]就是所有人都想
[01:33.46]与我为敌
[01:38.02]为自己活
[01:39.66]为敌就为敌
[01:44.08]要为自己活
[01:45.88]嘿 听着
[01:46.73]希望有人祈祷为我
[01:48.26]祈祷能有希望给我
[01:49.81]待在不是人待的地方 内心炸响
[01:52.06]名字上榜
[01:53.28]言语一声 现在就能出发
[01:54.50]路很遥远 油门踩到爆炸
[01:55.89]敌人紧追 能量哪里不对
[01:58.13]我得转头 跟他们说声再会
[01:59.27]别想一路总给我 玩点什么邪念
[02:00.80]坏脾气天生没怕 管你今天明天
[02:01.85]疯起来我手底下 不留任何情面
[02:03.76]打碎你家玻璃可 别找我要抱歉
[02:05.95]搞点破坏又怎么 本性随时在线
[02:08.22]飞弹出膛轰轰轰 跟我冲一路向前
[02:10.72]闭嘴吧闭嘴吧我没说什么忌讳 慌什么慌什么攻击手已经就位
[02:13.34]谁是坏蛋谁不是没有什么所谓 有种开门出来现在跟我对对
[02:15.07]每个人都想与我为敌
[02:18.81]别再假惺惺
[02:21.16]就是所有人都想
[02:23.25]与我为敌
[02:24.99]啊 痛苦
[02:27.27]每个人都想与我为敌
[02:31.19]别再假惺惺
[02:33.51]就是所有人都想
[02:35.64]与我为敌
[02:36.86]看开点 我不是圣人好意你省省
[02:41.88]与我为敌
[02:43.08]大度点 装什么圣人别再假惺惺
[02:46.55]就要为自己活
